MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA18 postcode area of Cumnock. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.50am to enable engineers to safely locate a faulty section of underground cable and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.30am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.28am on Monday 11th of January 2021.
